summary.title: Hogwarts Quidditch Festival App Threat Model
summary.description: This threat model covers the mobile app for the Hogwarts Quidditch Olympic Festival, used for fan engagement, scheduling, ticket purchasing, event check-in, VIP access, community features, vendor information, and sponsor advertising. It includes connections to third-parties like payment systems, security agencies, and external data providers, with a focus on ensuring compliance with Magic & Mystics Regulations (MMRs) for data privacy and security.

diagrams.title: Hogwarts Quidditch Festival App Threat Model
